p: The difference of age between the remission group and the non-remission group was analyzed by independent samples t-test, while the difference of hospitalization days between the oseltamivir group and the Non-use oseltamivir group was analyzed by Mann Whitney tests. Pearson's chi-squared test was used to compare the difference of history of oseltamivir use and sex between the remission group and the non-remission group. Fisher's exact test was used to compare the difference of response rate at different course of using oseltamivir. P-value less than 0.05, 0.01 and 0.001 were considered significant.
